name: Realistic Sledding Simulator
description:
Rich! Wealthy! Successful!  If these are the words that come to your mind when you think of happiness, then sledding may be the professional esport for you!

In this hyper realistic simulation game, you get to experience the highs and lows of a sled-boarders life, such as...

Sledding in snow! Invading people's houses! Being burnt alive! Fighting arch-enemies! And more! You may not be able to tell the difference between virtual sledding, and the real thing! Note: If this effect persists for more than 24 hours, please contact your local physician. Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD to rotate your sled

'Space', 'W', 'Z', or 'Up Arrow' to Jump

And that's about it for the most part!

You'll figure out the rest of the controls as you play, so there's no need to keep reading this description! Make sure to play Realistic Sledding Simulator to become epic today!

Made for the GDC Dev - Chill Jam 2018-19 . The theme "chill" is incorporated because there is snow, I guess.
